Katarina.name: ºKatarinaº
Katarina.title: ºøthe Sinister Bladeøº
Katarina.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºDriven by an intense killer instinct, Katarina uses her talents as an assassin for the glory of Noxus, and the continued elevation of her family. While her fervor drives her to ever-greater feats, it can sometimes lead her astray.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøFrom childhood, Katarina displayed a natural gift for combat. As the daughter of a prominent Noxian general many paths were open to her, but she rejected them all for the path of the blade. Rigorously trained by the finest assassins in Noxus, her father the best among them, it was not long before Katarina demanded her first assignment. The task they gave her was aggravatingly simple: assassinate a low-ranking Demacian officer. As she set to her work infiltrating the enemy camp, Katarina discovered an opportunity too tantalizing to pass by - the arrival of a Demacian General. Stalking him to his tent, she quietly dispatched his guards and slit his throat. Pleased with her impressive kill, she disappeared into the night. Katarina's elation faded the next day when her original objective, the Demacian officer, led his forces to ambush unprepared Noxian soldiers. Though the Noxians fought valiantly, they suffered heavy casualties. Furious at her mistake, Katarina set off to complete her original task. Returning to the camp, she spied her now heavily guarded target and realized a stealthy kill was no longer possible. Drawing her blades, Katarina swore the officer would die, no matter the cost. She leapt into battle, unleashing a whirlwind of steel. One by one blades flashed and guards fell, each strike bringing her one step closer to the officer. A final thrown dagger restored her honor. Bloody and bruised, Katarina barely escaped the Demacian forces, and returned to Noxus a changed woman. The scar she earned that night now serves as a constant reminder that she must never let passion interfere with duty.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøº''Never question my loyalty. You will never know what I endure for it.''ºøºøºøº
º-- Katarinaº
Katarina.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºDriven by an intense killer instinct, Katarina uses her talents as an assassin for the glory of Noxus, and the continued elevation of her family. While her fervor drives her to ever-greater feats, it can sometimes lead her ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºTry waiting until the other team is distracted with fighting your team, and use Shunpo to teleport into the fray and unleash a devastating Death Lotus.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøUsing Shunpo on an allied Champion, minion or ward can be a great escape tactic.øºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøKatarina's abilities deal magic damage, so even if she's building Attack Damage items, get magic resistance to counter her.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøTry to save a disable for when Katarina uses her Death Lotus.øºøºøº

spells.name: ºøBouncing Bladesº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºKatarina throws a dagger that bounces from enemy to enemy, dealing magic damage and marking them. Her next spell or basic attack against a marked target will consume the mark and deal additional magic damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøThrows a dagger dealing ºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø magic damage. The dagger bounces to the 4 closest enemies dealing 10% less damage with each bounce.øºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøEnemies hit are marked for 4 seconds. Katarina's basic attacks or spells will consume the mark dealing ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }})ºø additional magic damage.ºøº

spells.name: ºøSinister Steelº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKatarina whirls her daggers around her, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains a burst of speed for a short duration.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøWhirls daggers in a circle dealing ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºø magic damage. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains øºøºøº{{ e2 }}ºøº% movement speed for 1 second.ºøº

spells.name: Shunpoº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºKatarina instantly moves to her target's location and takes reduced damage from enemies for a few seconds. If the target is an enemy, she deals damage.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøMoves to a target's location. Deals ºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage if the target is an enemy.øºøº

ºøºøAfter using Shunpo, Katarina takes ºøº{{ e2 }}ºø% reduced damage for øº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

spells.name: ºDeath Lotusº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKatarina becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers with unrivaled speed at up to three nearby Champions. Daggers deal magic damage and reduce incoming healing on targets hit.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøBecomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers at the closest 3 enemy Champions dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }})ºøº magic damage over 2 seconds.ºøº

ºøºøºøºøDaggers apply Grievous Wounds, reducing incoming healing by 50% for 3 seconds.øºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºVoracityº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºChampion kills or assists reduce Katarina's cooldowns by 15 seconds.ºøºøºøº
